title: Stepbrother Boss
description: The arrogant, Herculean-looking man who comes on to me at my mom and new stepdad’s wedding is handsome and cocky and everything I need to stay away from. I know better than to get involved with a guy like him—especially since he’s at least ten years older than me and my stepbrother to boot.I have my career to focus on. I’m determined to work my way up at the most prestigious financial firm in the city. I’ll nail the interview and become the secretary to the most successful CEO in the city. From there, the sky’s the limit.What I didn’t count on was him being my infuriatingly conceited new stepbrother.
author: Emma Bray
